biotools.summary: SnpRecode is a tool meant to be implemented with the Fimpute imputation software. SnpRecode allows for fast and seamless conversion of genotypes to and from a format acceptable by Fimpute software. It also implements a fast genotype correlation function to estimate and plot the imputation accuracy. SnpRecode is implemented in Python.
